Exchange Act. ☐                                                                   
                                                                                  
  ITEM 8.01.Other Events.On June 26, 2023, Bank of America Corporation (“BAC”)    
  issued a press release announcing that interest rates and amounts payable with  
  respect to certain outstanding debt securities and certificates of deposit      
  issued by BAC and BofA Finance LLC that are linked to one or more tenors of     
  the USD LIBOR ICE Swap Rate benchmarks and are held through The Depository      
  Trust Company will be calculated pursuant to fallback provisions after June     
  30, 2023. The press release contains lists of CUSIP numbers for these           
  securities and certain other relevant information related thereto.Holders of    
  the affected securities are encouraged to review the information contained in   
  the press release, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 99 and         
  incorporated by reference into this Item 8.01.ITEM 9.01.Financial Statements    
  and Exhibits.(d) Exhibits.The following exhibits are filed                      
  herewith:EXHIBITNO.DESCRIPTION OF EXHIBIT99Bank of America Corporation press    
  release dated June 26, 2023104Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded in     
  the cover page formatted in Inline XBRL)2                                       
                                                                                  
SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934,   
the Registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the      
undersigned hereunto duly authorized.                                             
                                                                                  
       BANK OF AMERICA CORPORATION                                                
  By:                               /s/ Ross E. Jeffries, Jr.
